TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HostVisual extends System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual

Docs.summary: Represents a object that can be connected anywhere to a parent visual tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult HitTestCore(class System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters hitTestParameters) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implements HitTestCore to supply base hit testing behavior (returning ).
Docs.returns: Returns a value of type . The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> property contains the visual that was hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> never reports itself as being hit. To change this behavior, create a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult HitTestCore(class System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters hitTestParameters) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implements HitTestCore to supply base hit testing behavior (returning ).
Docs.returns: Returns a value of type . The <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> property contains the visual object that was hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> never reports itself as being hit. To change this behavior, create a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> methods.
